title: Ep 515 | Phil Robertson Is Recovering from Stabbing Himself with a Knife
description:
Phil tells a hilarious story about a recent self-inflicted injury and how one might skip a trip to the doctor. Jase shares the funny tale of throwing away his own shirt and talks about why he has to take a monthlong break from eating grits. Zach talks about the James Webb space telescope and how it demonstrates a more exact creation by God. Al gives some examples of places that need more God. And Jase pinpoints what a popular board game got wrong about life.

Sign up to watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
